title: Can't Buy RP
body:
Just shows this every time:
http://i.imgur.com/V9xV6d0.png

I've tried it on both clients

replies.body: We'd like to help and find out why that's happening.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our billing team will check this out with you.  We'll reply back asap!
